body:
Here's your pre-season **MLB Power Rankings**. Extracted just before Opening Day. This page should be your guide to sniping the futures markets on the World Series. We'll refer to the rankings and the sportsbook odds all season long. - - - ## **MLB Power Rankings - Opening Day** The following outputs are correct as at April 1st 2021. And stay tuned in a week for when the table is automatically updated every day. ![NHL Power Rankings](/images/uploads/mlb-power-rankings-1.png "NHL Power Rankings") - - - - - -
- - - ![NHL Power Rankings](/images/uploads/mlb-power-rankings-2.png "NHL Power Rankings") - - - - - - ## **What does the Rating mean?** The Dodgers are a shit tonne better than most of the league. Specifically, their 2.95 Rating makes them 2.97 runs better than Washington on a neutral venue. That's an incredible headstart. Let's see if they can maintain it when the season kicks off. - - - ## **World Series Selections** coming soon - - - ### **Want more insight? Join the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ### **
**
title: MLB Power Rankings: Your Guide To The World Series
seoTitle: MLB Power Rankings: Your Guide To The World Series
description: Do you want MLB Power Rankings from a professional sports betting model? Then you're in the right place. Bet Refinery has the most accurate MLB Power Rankings on the web.
